Gun on the ramparts



The white mark on the left edge of the picture is a ship out on the Mediterranean.
Taken Thursday, September 13, 2001, 06:18:03pm.  Original image size: 1600x1200, 900kb
Technical details: Olympus C700UZ, 1/320s @ F3.5, ISO 100, 246mm
PS6 Curves 10:0 - 45:30 - 115:130 - 155:!50 - 215:235 - 235:255, Saturate +10, USM 20:20 - 30:4 - 100:0.5
